@graph.caption: Quinoa Burrito Bowl with a Fork and Tortilla Chips on the Side

@graph.name: Vegan Burrito Bowl with Quinoa - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan burrito bowl with quinoa makes the perfect weeknight dinner. It's super easy to make, healthy, and packed with protein. Besides, it's vegan and gluten-free. It's one of my all-time favorite dinner recipes.

@graph.headline: Vegan Burrito Bowl with Quinoa
@graph.keywords: are burrito bowls healthy,burrito bowl with quinoa,burrito bowl without meat,how to make a burrito bowl,how to reheat a burrito bowl,quinoa burrito bowl,vegan burrito bowl,what are burrito bowls,what to put in a burrito bowl

@graph.name: Vegan Burrito Bowl with Quinoa
@graph.description: This vegan burrito bowl with quinoa makes the perfect weeknight dinner. It's super easy to make, healthy, and packed with protein. Besides, it's vegan and gluten-free.
recipeIngredient: 1 28 oz can diced tomatoes  (do not drain!)

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion and the garlic. Dice the bell pepper. Press the "sauté" button on your Instant Pot and wait until the pot is hot. Add some oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute. Stir in the uncooked quinoa, the bell pepper, the black beans, the corn, and the spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion and the garlic. Dice the bell pepper. Press the "sauté" button on your Instant Pot and wait until the pot is hot. Add some oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute. Stir in the uncooked quinoa, the bell pepper, the black beans, the corn, and the spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Then stir in the diced tomatoes (do not drain as you need the liquid). You don't need any additional water for this recipe. The diced tomatoes provide enough liquid. Press the "manual" button and choose 13 minutes on "high pressure". Close the instant pot and make sure it's sealing.
recipeInstructions.name: Then stir in the diced tomatoes (do not drain as you need the liquid). You don't need any additional water for this recipe. The diced tomatoes provide enough liquid. Press the "manual" button and choose 13 minutes on "high pressure". Close the instant pot and make sure it's sealing.

recipeInstructions.text: When the cooking time is over, do a "quick release". The quinoa should be fluffy. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: When the cooking time is over, do a "quick release". The quinoa should be fluffy. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the fresh lime juice and sprinkle the quinoa with chopped cilantro and green onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in the fresh lime juice and sprinkle the quinoa with chopped cilantro and green onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in a bowl together with lettuce, tortilla chips, and sliced avocado.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve in a bowl together with lettuce, tortilla chips, and sliced avocado.
